Check if a student exists in the database.
checkStudentRegistered(String) - Method in class courses.Course
This method checks if a student is registered for this Course, by checking if the the Student ID passed in matches any of the Student ID's registered for this Course.
clearComponentsWeightage() - Method in class courses.Course
This method sets componentWeightageList to an empty ArrayList.
ComponentResult - Class in grading
This entity class holds the result obtained for a Course's Component, and its weightage.

Constructor for Component Result
ComponentResult(ComponentWeightage) - Constructor for class grading.ComponentResult

ComponentWeightage - Class in courses
This entity class provides the weightage as a template for the computation of marks.
ComponentWeightage(String, int) - Constructor for class courses.ComponentWeightage
This constructor initialises the name and weightage of this Component based on the arguments passed in.
ComponentWeightage(ComponentWeightage) - Constructor for class courses.ComponentWeightage
This constuctor initialises the name and weightage of this Component based on the name and weightage of another Component passed in as argument.

Course - Class in courses
This entity class holds information of a course.
Course(String, String) - Constructor for class courses.Course
Constructor for course that initialises the course's code and name based on the arguments passed in, and initialises lessons, lessonTypes, registrations and componentWeightageList to new ArrayLists.
Course(String, String, FacultyMember) - Constructor for class courses.Course
Constructor for course that initialises the course's code, name and coordinator based on the arguments passed in, and initialises lessons, lessonTypes, registrations and componentWeightageList to new ArrayLists.
